title: Is talking on the phone science? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is talking on the phone science: Yes, it science. You asking this question on your smartphone is science, me answering this is science. Voice travelling from one end to another across the whole world with so many environmental factors against it, takes fairly nifty science to achieve that, chemistry to power things up using batteries, Physics, Electronics and communications principles principles to carry the signals as efficiently as possible. If you're talking about how to talk on phone, then its more of a social skill and there's a science behind it but that's not your traditional physics or chemistry.
The action itself? Not really The technology and concept that enable it? Oh yes How good you talk on the phone? Social science
